abstract: Facebook named Erskine B. Bowles, who recently co-chaired the Obama administration’s deficit-reduction commission, as its newest board member.
snippet: Facebook named Erskine B. Bowles, who recently co-chaired the Obama administration’s deficit-reduction commission, as its newest board member.
lead_paragraph: Facebook announced on Wednesday that it had named Erskine B. Bowles, former co-chairman of the Obama administration’s deficit-reduction commission, to its board.

headline.main: Facebook Adds Bowles to Its Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
